start.speaker: Korinth
start.text:
Balance is not achieved in one heroic gesture.

It is paid in small coins, every day. You choose what you spend.

choices.text: I’ll pay it with effort, not shortcuts.
I’ll pay it with honesty—even if it costs me.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Korinth inclines his head—a motion so small it could be mistaken for wind. You know better.
